ygData.subject: RE: SV: [EverQuest] EverQuest Networking Question
ygData.msgSnippet: You can cancel your account you know :) By the way, what I don t like is that if you want to subscribe to the six-month payment instead of the one-month
ygData.messageBody:
You can cancel your account you know :)

By the way, what I don't like is that if you want to subscribe to the six-month
payment instead of the one-month payment you have to cancel your account and
then create another one. That sucks.

> Man fuck that I just wish we didn't have some bullshit monthly
> payment shit for Everquest ..damn we paid 40.something bucks for that
> shit already......
>
> -RiOTBrEeD X-
>
> P.S. By the way email me back at DevastationAX@... I don't use
> thsi email addy anymore.
